title: Elderwood Lissandra

embed.description: Always thought this would be a very cool skin for Lissandra. Inspired by Victor Maury's Elderwood Hecarim, I wanted this to look like she was in that same forest, close to Hecarim. I would add him in the far back but the image was already too crowded so I chose to leave him out.

body: Guys, I just found this beautiful concept art of a fanmade skin called Elderwood Lissandra! It looks just awesome and like a really professional made splash art!! I want this to exist in game sooo bad!! So you have only two options, Rito: Make this masterpiece of a skin real, or at least hire this artist already!! Or both!! Just DO IT!! ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜‚
